sources.title: The Quiet One (1948) Nominated for 2 Oscars!
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Stars: Gary Merrill, Donald Thompson, Clarence Cooper
Director: Sidney Meyers

A documentary account of the rehabilitation at the Wiltwyck School of an emotionally disturbed Black boy who is unwanted, misunderstood, and inwardly tortured.

metadata.Plot: The story of a lonely young boy growing up in Harlem. Using a semi-documentary technique, the film-makers realistically capture the hostile environment which leads the boy to delinquency. The youth is sent to Wiltwyck School for rehabilitation, where a psychiatrist and counselor try to break through the wall of silence which the boy uses to hide his fear and bitterness.
metadata.Writer: James Agee, Janice Loeb, Sidney Meyers
metadata.Actors: Gary Merrill, Donald Thompson, Clarence Cooper
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 2 wins & 3 nominations total
